venue.address_2: Opposite Sears entrance at Galleria Ma
venue.name: VFW

item.description:
This is a Meetup posted also with Boston Area Musicians and Songwriters!

Free upbeat music, pool table, inexpensive drinks, near Lechmere T station (Green Line).

Play, (all styles welcome, bring instrument), or sing along! Good time. Ages range about 25-50.
Or just chat & listen & join in a pool game if you want! Ends by around 10 PM.

Beer advertised $2.75 to $3.75 for imports, glass of wine $3.00; very reasonably priced mixed drinks also!

The low-key party atmosphere is good for meeting friends 'cause it isn't too loud.
Choose big round table seating with others at this Meetup; smaller independent ones also available; self-serve (at the bar).

Don't forget to check with the Boston Area Musicians and Songwriters group to see who else is going!
item.name: Beer, Pool, and Free Music!
